---
title: "Online HRT Map"
runtime: shiny
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(leaflet)
library(htmltools)
```



```{r eruptions, echo=FALSE}

clinics <- read.csv("clinics.csv")



popupContent <- paste(renderUI(<a href=clinics$website>clinics$name</a>, "<br>"),
                      clinics$website, "<br>",
                      clinics$street1, "<br>",
                      clinics$city, "," , clinics$state, ",", clinics$ZIP,"<br>",
                      clinics$phone, "<br>")

leaflet(data = clinics) %>% addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(~long, ~lat, popup = popupContent)

```
